title: How to Make Mini Corn Dogs

steps.headline: Cut the hot dogs into six parts, crosswise.
Combine the dry ingredients in a medium bowl.
Whisk the buttermilk, eggs, and vegetable oil in a small bowl.
Barely combine the wet ingredients with the dry ingredients.
steps.description: Finish the batter by adding the melted butter and mix it in.

steps.headline: Add about a tablespoon of batter into pre-greased mini muffin tins.
Layer a hot dog piece on the batter.
steps.description: You may push down on it, so it sticks into the batter.

steps.headline: Spoon another tablespoon of batter on top to cover it.
Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, or until the tops are golden brown.
Use ketchup and mustard as dipping condiments.

text: Preheat the oven to 350ºF/180ºC.  Cut the hot dogs into six parts, crosswise.  Combine the dry ingredients in a medium bowl.  Whisk the buttermilk, eggs, and vegetable oil in a small bowl.  Barely combine the wet ingredients with the dry ingredients. Finish the batter by adding the melted butter and mix it in. Add about a tablespoon of batter into pre-greased mini muffin tins.  Layer a hot dog piece on the batter. You may push down on it, so it sticks into the batter. Spoon another tablespoon of batter on top to cover it.  Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, or until the tops are golden brown.  Use ketchup and mustard as dipping condiments.
